name: Barira
greetingText: I really love your name and smile btw!
textInChatBox: Happiest birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
wishText: May you always smile like this and you shine in my life and prosper in yours <3
outroText: Okay, now keep smiling coz thats the most beautiful thing about you <3.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again. Also come back I'm waiting for you in the chat.
